name: ARAB BANK, PLC, petitioner, v. Courtney LINDE, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
ARAB BANK, PLC, petitioner,
v.
Courtney LINDE, et al.
attorneys: Motion of The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Union of Arab Banks for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
ARAB BANK, PLC, petitioner,
v.
Courtney LINDE, et al.
No. 12-1485.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 30, 2014.
Case below, 706 F.3d 92.
Motion of The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Union of Arab Banks for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
